dimes.measurements.nio
Class RawNetworkStack

java.lang.Object
  dimes.measurements.nio.NetworkStack
      dimes.measurements.nio.RawNetworkStack
All Implemented Interfaces:
NativeLogger
public class RawNetworkStack
extends NetworkStack
implements NativeLogger

Author:
Ohad Serfaty a raw socket network stack for the usage of IP-V4 Please note that this class is a singleton and can be accessed only threw the getInstance() function.

is full and then perform a callback.

setCallbackBufferSize

public void setCallbackBufferSize(int size)
Description copied from class: NetworkStack
Set the size of the PacketBuffer. when a receive() method is called with a non-null buffer ,
it will perform a callback after accumulating this number of packets.
Default size is 10 packets.

Specified by:
setCallbackBufferSize in class NetworkStack
Parameters:
size - number of packets to buffer before calling 'callback'

receive

public void receive(long listenTimeout,
                    PacketBuffer buffer,
                    CallbackContext context)
             throws MeasurementException
Description copied from class: NetworkStack
When one of the parameters is null , this function acts like the on of the subsequent
receive() functions
When both buffer and context are not null , the function will listen until the buffer
is full and then perform a callback.

Specified by:
receive in class NetworkStack
Parameters:
listenTimeout - time to listen
buffer - a buffer to fill packets with
context - callback context
Throws:
MeasurementException
